featured.text: Being a very careful person, he is quite in giving his comments.
Given this powerful effect, parents who are trying to lose weight should be careful of how their dieting habits can influence a child’s perceptions about food and healthful eating.

definition.zh_def: 小心的，謹慎的，注意避免錯誤或危險的。
definition.en_def: Cautious and attentive to avoid mistakes or dangers.
definition.example: She was careful while crossing the busy street.
